ygData.subject: Re: Buying and Selling Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I beleive the answer to this one is.  You can buy it but cannot scribe it until you are the appropriate level. ... eqbards-owner@onelist.com ... currently ...
ygData.messageBody:
I beleive the answer to this one is. You can buy it but cannot scribe
it until you are the appropriate level.


> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
> To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Fri, 14 May 1999 12:27:30 -0500
> Mailing-List: list eqbards@onelist.com; contact
eqbards-owner@onelist.com
> Delivered-To: mailing list eqbards@onelist.com
> List-Unsubscribe: <mailto:eqbards-unsubscribe@...>
> Mime-Version: 1.0
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Buying and Selling Songs
>
> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
> Also can you buy a higher level song than the level you have
currently
> obtained and scribe it before you reach the level that you can
acutally use
> it?
>
> Faras of Qeynos
> Half-Elf Bard
> E'Ci Server
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Douglas Bierbower [mailto:Bierbower@...]
> > Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 12:32 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] Buying and Selling Songs
> >
> >
> > From: Douglas Bierbower <Bierbower@...>
> >
> > I also got burned by the one lore item limitation. I tried
> > to buy two copies of
> > two songs in Kelthin and paid for all four but only ended up
> > with one copy of
> > each. I petitioned and was told, in essence, tough luck.
> > Thanks for the great
> > documentation Verant. It appears that this has been
> > corrected a little. I put
> > a copy of a song in the bank and tried to purchase another
> > copy and it would not
> > sell it to me. Good work Verant. I still want my platinum back.
> >
> > I do not know if I can buy a song that I have already
> > scribed. Has anyone tried
> > that?
> >
> > Narcissus of Povar, Bard of the 17th Song
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > --------------------------------------------------------------

> > http://www.ONElist.com
> > Join one today!
> >
